mapper.select:
select a.BO as bo, a.PRINT_DATE as printDate, b.${labelPrintQueryDto.queryColumn} as elementCode, a.BAR_CODE_AMOUNT as barCodeAmount, a.START_CODE as startCode, a.END_CODE as endCode, a.TEMPLATE_TYPE as templateType, a.LODOP_TEXT as lodopText, a.IS_COMPLEMENT as isComplement, a.RULE_LABEL_BO as ruleLabelBo, l.LABEL AS label, irl.LABEL_TYPE AS labelType, irl.RULE_LABEL AS ruleLabel, irl.RULE_LABEL_NAME AS ruleLabelName, cr.CODE_RULE_TYPE AS codeRuleType from label_label_print a left join ${labelPrintQueryDto.tableName} b on a.ELEMENT_BO = b.BO left join label_rule_label irl on a.RULE_LABEL_BO = irl.BO left join m_code_rule cr on cr.BO = irl.CODE_RULE_BO left join label_label l on l.ID = irl.LABEL_BO where a.site = #{labelPrintQueryDto.site} and a.ELEMENT_TYPE = #{labelPrintQueryDto.elementType}
AND a.CREATE_DATE = TO_DATE( #{labelPrintQueryDto.createDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND a.PRINT_DATE = TO_DATE( #{labelPrintQueryDto.printDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND b.${labelPrintQueryDto.queryColumn} like '%${labelPrintQueryDto.elementCode}%'
ORDER BY a.CREATE_DATE DESC

select a.BO as bo, a.PRINT_DATE as printDate, pp.PACK_NAME as elementCode, a.BAR_CODE_AMOUNT as barCodeAmount, a.START_CODE as startCode, a.END_CODE as endCode, a.TEMPLATE_TYPE as templateType, a.LODOP_TEXT as lodopText, a.IS_COMPLEMENT as isComplement, a.RULE_LABEL_BO as ruleLabelBo, l.LABEL AS label, irl.LABEL_TYPE AS labelType, irl.RULE_LABEL AS ruleLabel, irl.RULE_LABEL_NAME AS ruleLabelName, cr.CODE_RULE_TYPE AS codeRuleType, pp.PACK_NAME as packingName, a.CREATE_DATE AS createDate from label_label_print a left join p_packing pp on a.ELEMENT_BO = pp.BO left join label_rule_label irl on a.RULE_LABEL_BO = irl.BO left join m_code_rule cr on cr.BO = irl.CODE_RULE_BO left join label_label l on l.ID = irl.LABEL_BO where a.site = #{labelPrintQueryDto.site} and a.ELEMENT_TYPE = #{labelPrintQueryDto.elementType}
AND a.PRINT_DATE = TO_DATE( #{labelPrintQueryDto.printDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND a.CREATE_DATE = TO_DATE( #{labelPrintQueryDto.createDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND pp.${labelPrintQueryDto.queryColumn} like CONCAT(#{labelPrintQueryDto.elementCode},'%')
ORDER BY a.CREATE_DATE DESC
select PACKING_BO as packingBo, OBJECT_BO as itemBo from p_pack_level where BO = #{bo}

select a.id, b.sn, c.item, c.item_name, c.zs_type, b.state, c.lot_size, a.sysl, a.shop_order_bo, a.pc, a.sfgq, (CASE WHEN a.sfgq = 'N' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END) AS sfgq_name from z_sn_item a LEFT JOIN z_sn b ON b.BO = a.sn_bo LEFT JOIN m_item c ON c.BO = a.item_bo ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select
a.SN from z_sn a left join label_label_print b on a.LABEL_PRINT_BO = b.BO left join M_ITEM c on b.ELEMENT_BO = c.BO where c.item in
#{id}
and a.STATE !='used' and b.ELEMENT_TYPE = 'ITEM' ORDER BY a.SN

select c.item
from z_sn a left join label_label_print b on a.LABEL_PRINT_BO = b.BO left join M_ITEM c on b.ELEMENT_BO = c.BO
where a.sn = #{sn} and b.ELEMENT_TYPE = 'ITEM' ORDER BY a.SN
select b.ELEMENT_BO from z_sn a left join label_label_print b on a.LABEL_PRINT_BO = b.BO where a.sn = #{sn} and b.ELEMENT_TYPE = 'SHOP_ORDER' ORDER BY a.SN
